title: Basic Greetings and Farewells
description: Improve your Japanese speaking skills with basic greetings and farewells. Focus on clear pronunciation and appropriate intonation.
instructions: Below is a list of common Japanese greetings and farewell phrases.
Aim for clear and natural pronunciation.
Maintain a conversational and steady pace.
After recording, listen to your playback and compare it to the text.
Pay attention to intonation, clarity, and fluency in Japanese.
Repeat the recording process as necessary to improve your Japanese speaking skills.

items.question: こんにちは、お元気ですか？ (Konnichiwa, ogenki desu ka?)
items.answer: こんにちは、お元気ですか？ (Konnichiwa, ogenki desu ka?)

items.question: おはようございます。 (Ohayou gozaimasu.)
items.answer: おはようございます。 (Ohayou gozaimasu.)

items.question: 調子はどうですか？ (Choushi wa dou desu ka?)
items.answer: 調子はどうですか？ (Choushi wa dou desu ka?)

items.question: お気をつけて。 (Oki o tsukete.)
items.answer: お気をつけて。 (Oki o tsukete.)

scoring.2-4 correct pronunciations: Fair. You have a basic ability to pronounce Japanese phrases, but there are several areas needing significant improvement.
